trans-unit.source: When the Reset Button is pressed on the scrollbar, the chart by default displays the last view for that particular axis. This sample uses the AxisScrollBarClicked event to customize the behavior to resetting both the X and Y axis views.
trans-unit.target: When the Reset Button is pressed on the scrollbar, the chart by default displays the last view for that particular axis. This sample uses the AxisScrollBarClicked event to customize the behavior to resetting both the X and Y axis views.
